resources.string:
CREATED BY:
 				SHAIKH SHAHID
 				SHAIKH AMAAN
 				ABDUL RAHIM
 				KHAN ASHRAF

This app is about Number System Conversion.
In this app, We have design such a system that it will performs number conversion from one number system to another. 
It is dynamic conversion in which when user enter the number in particular number system then automatically it wil converted into another number system. 
We have also provided tutorial for better understanding for the user that how conversion take place or methods to convert number system.
UNDER THE GUIDANCE OF:\n \tPROF. REHAAL QURESHI
